content.html: I've got all the military memories saved offline and can pull those out at any point. But, I want my kids and later their kids, to have a place to come see what their grandfather did. How I tried to make the world a little bit better. No kids? Even more reason to maintain one!
content.value:
I've got all the military memories saved offline and can pull those out at any point. But, I want my kids and later their kids, to have a place to come see what their grandfather did. How I tried to make the world a little bit better.

No kids? Even more reason to maintain one!
